Sentence: A detailed assessment of a proposed technical change (EC) or its effects is a time-consuming process that requires extensive user experience and expertise. Companies therefore plan a detailed assessment of only those EC effects that could have significant effects. Therefore, the effects of the EC effect should be predicted on the basis of previous EC effects that are similar to it.

Sentence: Mechanical engineering drawings ( MEDs ) accompany a product life cycle from conception to final production . The digitisation of MEDs has become more and more important due to requirements for the authenticity of the date , the protection of intellectual property , efficient date storage and communication and compliance with date integrity and security directives . Unlike CAD-based engineering design software , older MEDs are often drawn manually or contain manually marked specifications on blueprints . Therefore , GTSCs on MEDs should be automatically identified and learn .

Sentence: The design FMEA (DFMEA), used in the product development phase to identify and mitigate product risk, is one of the three application scenarios of FMEA. During the DFMEA process, verification and validation measures (V&V activities) are proposed to reduce the risk of identified potential failure modes. V&V activities can be further planned and implemented to improve product safety in the development process. However, the DFMEA report usually contains extensive text descriptions of possible failure modes and causes, and it is difficult and not intuitive to fully understand this information for design improvements. Moreover, it is very difficult to optimize the planning of V&V activities by selecting a number of V&V activities in order to achieve one with the minimum resource consumption requirements. Therefore, failure modes and their causes should be categorised on the basis of the DFMEA report.
Label: Classification

Sentence: Failure mode and effects analysis (FMEA) has been widely used in product design process as a reliability analysis technique. Design FMEA (DFMEA), which is used in the product development phase to identify and mitigate product risk, is one of the three application scenarios of FMEA. During the DFMEA process, verification and validation (V&V) activities are proposed to mitigate the risk of the identified potential failure modes. The V&V activities can be further planned and implemented to improve the product reliability under development. However, the DFMEA report usually contains rich text descriptions of potential failure modes and causes, and it is difficult and nonintuitive to fully understand these information for design improvements. In addition, it is also very challenging to optimize the planning of V&V activities by selecting a set of V&V activities to achieve expected reliability improvement effectiveness with the minimum resource consumption requirement. Therefore, based on the DFMEA report, failure modes and their causes should be categorized.
Label: Classification

Sentence: Different process sequences are in the assembly process of aerospace complex components , among which there are many common and typical process sequences involved . But currently the reusability of a large number of process files is low , and the reuse of existing process files can not be spotted . Therefore , the typical process sequence should be identified to guide technologists in writing new processes , so that the efficient reuse of historical process schemes , improving the efficiency of equipment process preparation and shortening the process design cycle . The potential sequence relationships between processes should be researched so that a better application in the process design system and provides considerable convenience for process personnel .
Label: Association Rule

Sentence: Decision-making on design features such as specifications and components is an essential aspect of new product development . Customers product preferences and their variations provide the basis of design features decision . Label: Clustering

Sentence: Mechanical engineering drawings (MEDs) accompany a product lifecycle from conceptional design to final production. The digitisation of MEDs has become increasingly important due to demands for data authenticity, intellectual property protection, efficient data storage and communication, and compliance with data integrity and security regulations. Unlike CAD-based engineering design software, legacy MEDs are often manually drawn or contain manually labeled specifications on blueprints. A notable gap exists in the automated process pipeline of modern Computer-Aided Tolerance (CAT) software, particularly in integrating Geometrical Tolerance Specification Callouts (GTSC) on MEDs. Therefore, GTSCs on MEDs should be automatically identified and read.
Label: Classification

Therefore, the sector should be segmented to product specifications from an engineering design perspective. The effectiveness of the portfolio should be visualized.

Sentence: Most companies consistently analyze product portfolios in order to gain insights into the establishment of future strategies . The effectiveness of the portfolio is a kind of analysis index based on the industry share of the portfolio in terms of the number of models in the portfolio . As there are too many products on the industry , companies need to divide the industry into comprehensible size for the analysis . Therefore , the industry should be segmented according to product specifications from an engineering design perspective . The effectiveness of the portfolio should be visualized .
Label: Clustering

Sentence: Mechanical engineering drawings (MEDs) accompany a product life cycle from conception to final production. The digitisation of MEDs has become more and more important due to requirements for the authenticity of the date, the protection of intellectual property, efficient date storage and communication and compliance with date integrity and security regulations. Unlike CAD-based engineering design software, older MEDs are often drawn manually or contain manually marked specifications on blueprints. A notable gap exists in the automated process pipeline of modern computer-aided tolerance (CAT) software, especially in integrating geometric tolerance specification Callouts (GTSC) on MEDs. Therefore, GTSCs on MEDs should be automatically identified and read.
Label: Classification

Sentence: Constrained optimization problems (COPs) with multiple computational expensive constraints are commonly encountered in simulation-based engineering designs. During the optimization process, the feasibility analysis of the intermediate solutions depends on the computational simulations will be computationally prohibitive. To reduce computational burden, the feasibility of intermediate solutions should be analyzed efficiently.
Label: Classification

Sentence: The functional aspects of many consumer products that are used in our daily lives are now fully mature. Companies that want to develop new products are now obliged to place an ever stronger emphasis on an apparent product style, i.e. its color and shape. Traditional numerical approaches, however, are limited in their ability to determine an individual psychological response to a particular product style. A mutual dependence exists between a product form and its color when considering the overall perception of the product. Therefore, the overall perception of a multi-coloured product design should be evaluated.
Label: Regression

Sentence: A detailed appraisal of a proposed technical change ( EC ) or its effects is a time-consuming process that requires extensive user experience and expertise . Companies therefore plan a detailed appraisal of only those EC effects that could have significant effects . Given that alike EC effects are likely to have alike effects , previous EC knowledge can be used to determine whether the proposed EC effect has a significant impact . Therefore , the effects of the EC effect should be predicted on the basis of previous EC effects that are alike to it .
Label: Classification

Sentence: Life cycle concerns have been considered as a major issue of increasing importance. Recently, companies have realized that both environmental and economic aspects have become a more competitive issue. This environmental and economic performance of a product includes all life cycle phases, from raw material extraction to end-of-life treatment. Life-cycle cost (LCC) has been considered to enable a comprehensive cost analysis to be carried out to improve economic performance, but this method is usually time and cost consuming. Therefore, there is a need for easy-to-use and approximate methods to support cost-effective decision making in early product development. To integrate Life Cycle Cost (LCC) into early product development, maintenance costs—one component of LCC—should be estimated based on product attributes.
Label: Regression

Sentence: In order to ensure the performance of complex products, it is necessary to model the deviation transfer flow of the assembly process of complex products and to identify key processes and properties and to determine their influence range. A number of assembly performance influencing factors was defined by the analysis of the complex product assembly process, and complex networks in combination with entropy weight method were used to identify the influencing factors of product performance to achieve the identification of important influencing factors. Based on the key factor identification results, the rules that connect key factors and performance should be identified to guide the assembly of complex products and achieve transparent and controllable performance.
Label: Association Rule
